name: NPR
text:
New York City has reopened its public schools for in-person classes. Just over half of the city's 1.1 million students are following a hybrid schedule to preserve social distancing.

name: NPR
text:
RT @npratc: What are the most powerful social media companies doing about disinformation? Today on #NPRConsiderThis, Facebook Chief Operating Officer Sheryl Sandberg explains what lessons the company learned from 2016 and what they're doing differently this time.
https://t.co/icuovjqozd
